generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and traffic flow.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, showing a partly cloudy sky.
- person: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black car in the foreground.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections on both sides of the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a stop sign and other regulatory signs.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other utility poles are visible along the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible being ridden by a person on the right side of the road.
